people.name: Richard C. Miller
people.description: Richard Crump Miller  was an American photographer best known for his vintage carbro prints, photos of celebrities, and work documenting the Hollywood Freeway.

people.name: Sven Davidson
people.description: Sven Davidson  was a Swedish tennis player who became the first Swede to win a Grand Slam title when he won the French Championships in 1957.

people.description: Zooey Claire Deschanel  is an American actress and singer-songwriter.

people.name: Grey DeLisle
people.description: Erin Grey Van Oosbree , known professionally as Grey DeLisle  and Grey Griffin, is an American voice actress and singer-songwriter.

people.name: Madonna
people.description: Madonna Louise Ciccone  is an American singer, songwriter, dancer, actress, and businesswoman.

people.name: Don Nicholl
people.description: Donald "Don" Nicholl  was an English-American screenwriter and producer.

people.name: Elle Fanning
people.description: Mary Elle Fanning  is an American actress.  She is the younger sister of actress Dakota Fanning and mainly known for her starring roles in Phoebe in Wonderland, Somewhere, We Bought a Zoo, Maleficent, and as Jesse in 2016's The Neon Demon.
